A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi is an abomination to the series and a swift kick in the groin to diehard fans.   It's as if Rian Johnson listed out on a whiteboard everything the fan base would want answers about or to see: 1) What is Snoke's backstory? 2) Who are Rey's parents? 3) Luke being a hero and just completely subverted expectations purposefully.  The answer to Rey's parentage is horrible.  Alcoholic parents who sell her off to get more booze? Snoke is killed halfway through without even a fight or battle? Luke doesn't even fight and then he dies?  

I get that on occasion you want to have humor in the movie to keep it fun\, but the humor here was just awful\, and at times cringey.  

WORST. STAR WARS. EVER.
